definitions.example: He spent six years in the military.

definitions.definition: Characteristic of members of the armed forces.
definitions.example: She was dishonorably discharged from all military duties.

definitions.definition: Relating to armed forces such as the army, marines, navy and air force (often as distinguished from civilians or police forces).
definitions.example: If you join a military force, you may end up killing people.

definitions.definition: Relating to armies or ground forces.
